content: this is a legal case about a dispute over coownership of a property the case was heard in the municipal court slavonski brod the procedure lasted for one year and six months the final resolution was to dissolve the coownership and sell the property through a public auction or another appropriate method the proceeds from the sale were divided proportionally among the coowners the petitioner had a 1620 share while the opposing parties had 120 shares each the decision was based on a property law that allows for the division of joint ownership the property in question was a building and a courtyard the court determined the market value of the property and concluded that a physical division is possible both parties are now required to follow the law
